solution_line_template: She started buying plants in {start_year} and it's now {current_year} so she has bought these plants for {current_year}-{start_year} = <<{num_years}={num_years}>>{num_years} years
Each plant costs ${plant_cost} and she has bought them for {num_years} years so she has spent {plant_cost}*{num_years} = $<<{plant_cost}*{num_years}={total_spent}>>{total_spent} on hydrangeas
